sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"工资，收入"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: earnings, allowance, income, salary, wage, pay, fee
means: earnings ： 多指通过劳动或投资等手段所得到的收入。
allowance ： 指收入中的补贴部分。
income与earnings含义很相近，但前者强调总收入。
salary ： 指按年定下，按月或星期平均给予的报酬，指脑力劳动者的薪水。
wage ： 多用复数形式，指按小时、日或星期的报酬，通常指体力劳动者的工资。
pay ： 是个通用词，可取代salary与wage.
fee ： 指提供某种服务收取的固定费用。

sentence.Network_en: At the highest executive levels earnings and performance aren't always correlated.
sentence.Network_cn: 在最高管理层，收入与工作表现并不总是相关的。

sentence.Network_en: The merger puts the firm in a position to triple its earnings.
sentence.Network_cn: 合并可使公司利润增长两倍。

sentence.Network_en: To keep it going, Lenoire kicked in her own earnings from acting.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了使它继续下去，勒努瓦捐出了自己演戏挣的钱。

entry.def: Your earnings are the sums of money that you earn by working.

example.ex: Average weekly earnings rose by 1.5% in July...
He was satisfied with his earnings as an accountant.
example.tran: 他对自己会计师的收入很满意。

means.word_mean: 1. the excess of revenues over outlays in a given period of time (including depreciation and other non-cash expenses)

sentences.sentence: "they saved a quarter of all their earnings"

auth_sentence.content: College does lead to higher earnings for most people.
auth_sentence.res_content: College does lead to higher earnings for most people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: College does lead to higher earnings for most people.

auth_sentence.content: The upscale retailer also boosted its full-year earnings guidance.
auth_sentence.res_content: The upscale retailer also boosted its full-year earnings guidance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The upscale retailer also boosted its full-year earnings guidance.

auth_sentence.content: End the default practice of issuing quarterly earnings guidance.
auth_sentence.res_content: End the default practice of issuing quarterly earnings guidance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: End the default practice of issuing quarterly earnings guidance.

sentences.en: The gangsters offered him a sum equivalent to a whole year’s earnings.
sentences.cn: 歹徒提出要给他一笔相当于他一年收入的钱。

sentences.en: Their earnings were ￡250, ￡300 and ￡420, giving a total of ￡970.
sentences.cn: 他们的收入分别为250 英镑、300 英镑、420 英镑，总计970 英镑。

sentences.en: Most equipment on the dairy farm was purchased with the worker’s own earnings.
sentences.cn: 这个奶场的大部分设备都是工人们自己的劳动收益换来的。
